title: Regulation (EEC) No 2456/72 of the Council of 21 November 1972 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2517/69 laying down certain measures for reorganising Community fruit production
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 2456/72 OF THE COUNCIL of 21 November 1972 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2517/69 laying down certain measures for reorganising Community fruit production
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 2 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2517/69, the date 1 March 1971 shall be replaced by 1 February 1973.
In Article 2 (2) (a) the date 1 March 1973 shall be replaced by 1 April 1973.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 November 1972.
For the Council
The President
P. LARDINOIS  1 OJ No L 318, 18.12.1969, p. 15.
2 OJ No L 266, 9.12.1970, p. 2.
